input.sentences: we brought my father 's remains to the crematorium today .
the cemetery was full of tombstones .
it had many large headstones too .
it was behind our local church .
we got my father an angel statue .
output.sentences: Yesterday, we picked up my father's remains at the crematorium.
We went to the cemetery, were there are a lot of tombstones.
Luckily, we had already looked at headstones and picked his out.
His funeral was held at a local church.
We buried my father near a statue of an angel.
